snippet: After the company’s quarterly results showed a drop in net profit of 10 percent, Siemens said it would buy back as much as 4 billion euros of its own shares.
abstract: Siemens reports fourth-quarter profit of 1.1 billion euros, or roughly $1.5 billion, from 1.2 billion euros in same period year earlier; cites dipping sales and restructuring costs.
lead_paragraph: After the company’s quarterly results showed a drop in net profit of 10 percent, Siemens said it would buy back as much as 4 billion euros of its own shares.
